name: UpdateReleasePlanResultsTask
friendlyName: Update Release Plan with Test Results
description: Reads an XML test result file and updates a release plan in Azure DevOps
helpMarkDown: Use this task to update your release plan with test results.
author: Nathan Araujo

inputs.name: releasePlanName
inputs.label: Release Plan Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the release plan to update.

inputs.name: testResultsFilePath
inputs.label: Test Results File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the XML or JSON file containing the test results.

inputs.name: testRunName
inputs.label: Test Run Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Test Run to be created.

inputs.name: reportType
inputs.label: Report Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: report Type to extrat the test results. Supported types: junit, playwright-json, cucumber-json.

inputs.name: useTestInfo
inputs.label: Use Test Info
inputs.helpMarkDown: To use or not test.info() to get TestCaseIds from the test results.
